name: City Destruction
description:
A city is randomly generated, and you can blow it up by clicking. Watch out because you only have a limited amount of bombs and you need to do at least 80% destruction to the city!

As you progress through the levels, cities get bigger, but you get more bombs.

There are two modes, "Play" which is the regular game with 10 levels of difficulty, or "Sandbox" which generates a massive city and gives you unlimited bombs to have unlimited fun.
